findings.title: Reflected XSS Vulnerability
findings.description: Script tag injection - XSS payload reflected without encoding
findings.impact: Session hijacking, credential theft, malicious redirects
findings.remediation: Implement output encoding, Content Security Policy

findings.title: Token Reuse Detected
findings.description: Authentication tokens are being reused across sessions

findings.title: Missing Security Header: strict-transport-security
findings.impact: Increased attack surface for various web attacks
findings.remediation: Add strict-transport-security header to all responses

findings.title: Missing Security Header: referrer-policy
findings.description: Referrer information control - Header not present
findings.impact: Increased attack surface for various web attacks
findings.remediation: Add referrer-policy header to all responses

findings.title: Missing Security Header: permissions-policy
findings.description: Browser feature control - Header not present
findings.impact: Increased attack surface for various web attacks
findings.remediation: Add permissions-policy header to all responses

recommendations.action: Fix all CRITICAL and HIGH severity vulnerabilities
recommendations.details: These pose immediate risk to system security

recommendations.action: Implement security headers and input validation
Regular security assessments and penetration testing
recommendations.details: Maintain security awareness and catch new vulnerabilities
